metadata.title: CVE-2020-25649 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in FasterXML Jackson Databind, where it did not haveentity expansion secured properly. This flaw allows vulnerability to XMLexternal entity (XXE) attacks. The highest threat from this vulnerabilityis data integrity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25649` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.11.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.1-1').
